posts.title: Coming
posts.desc: Shane (Chantavit Dhanasevi) is an indebted theater projectionist who has vowed to hack an upcoming Thai horror movie that concerns the vengeful spirit of a crazy village woman who was hanged after she was discovered kidnapping and blind children. After the disappearance of his friend who was recording the film in the cinema with his DV camera,

posts.title: Interstellar
posts.desc: In the near future, the Earth is less and less welcoming to humanity which is experiencing a serious food crisis. The film chronicles the adventures of a group of explorers who use a recently discovered rift in space-time to push human limits
